episode: My niece plays college golf and her tournament was cancelled so I was feeling sad for her.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Hi what's up

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Greetings! How art thou?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thou ast okey dokey

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm glad to hear!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am glad you are glad!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's wonderful!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's a wonderful life!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Indeed, life can be challenging.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah so anywho I was a bit sad the other day

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that. What happened?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My neice's golf tournament was cancelled

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's unfortunate. How is she handling it?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: She is a bit sad like myself

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that. I hope there's another opportunity soon.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Actually that was the last tournament of the season

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a shame. Perhaps next season will be better.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: There won't be a next season. She is graduating this May

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's tough. Maybe she'll find other opportunities after graduation.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: maybe

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Indeed, life may surprise her.
